title: Is There Such A Thing As The Perfect Trainer?
description:
How do you accept and find meaning in something you can't fix? Plus, finding a trainer who specializes in the areas of your goal; and email question about office exercises, stretching gyms, and more!


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
